title.narrative: Leveraging strategic health financing for Universal Health Coverage

description.narrative: The intervention will focus on Universal Health Coverage in Uganda following a Rights Based Approach. It will support result based financing as a key strategy to improve provision of quality services, efficiency and equity in recourse allocation and as a first step towards a third-payment system of a public health insurance system. Attention for patients’ rights and protection will be included. In this way the intervention will contribute to modelling a sustainable health insurance scheme and organization in Uganda, through support field to Districts and Health Facilities in the Rwenzori, West Nile regions and Acholi sub-region in Uganda, as well as a strategic support to the RBF unit at the ministry’s level. The intervention will provide direct support in the area of emergency response in order to strengthen the referral system, and in the area of sexual and reproductive health services and rights to strengthen demand and access, in particular for adolescents and in the area of family planning.
